title: Today's date
description: Enter today's date

title: Today's date (Easy)
description: Enter today's date, with a hint available.

title: Yesterday's date (Hard)
description: Enter yesterday's date, with no placeholder hint.

title: Button megastar
description: Click everything on the page to reveal the password

title: Button megastar (Easy)
description: Click the correct item on the page to reveal the password. Fewer items to click.

title: Button megastar (Hard)
description: Click the correct item on the page to reveal the password. Many items to click, requires scrolling.

title: Click³
description: Click three times before time runs out

title: Click³ (Easy)
description: Click three times before time runs out (10 seconds).

title: Click³ (Hard)
description: Click three times before time runs out (3 seconds).

title: Patience test
description: Wait the perfect amount of time to reveal the password

title: Patience test (Easy)
description: Wait 5 seconds to reveal the password.

title: Patience test (Hard)
description: Wait 20 seconds to reveal the password.

title: Slider symphony
description: Align the boxes by mastering the vertical sliders!

title: Slider symphony (Easy)
description: Align fewer boxes by mastering the vertical sliders!

title: Slider symphony (Hard)
description: Align more boxes with greater precision using vertical sliders!

title: Emoji remember
description: Remember the sequence of emojis to unlock the secret

title: Emoji remember (Easy)
description: Remember a shorter sequence of emojis.

title: Emoji remember (Hard)
description: Remember a longer sequence of emojis with more decoys, shown in parts.

title: Bullseye
description: Click the moving target three times - but watch out, it gets faster!

title: Bullseye (Easy)
description: Click the moving target. It's slower and requires fewer hits.

title: Bullseye (Hard)
description: Click the fast moving target. It's faster and requires more hits.

title: I Accept
description: Prove you're human by agreeing to our terms

title: I Accept (Easy)
description: Quickly prove you're human.

title: I Accept (Hard)
description: Undergo rigorous human verification.

title: River Crossing
description: Transport a wolf, goat, and cabbage across the river safely

title: River Crossing (Easy)
description: Transport a wolf and goat across the river safely.

title: River Crossing (Hard)
description: Transport a wolf, goat, cabbage, and fox across the river safely.

title: Towers of Hanoi
description: Stack the disks on the rightmost peg following the rules

title: Towers of Hanoi (Easy)
description: Stack 3 disks on the rightmost peg following the rules

title: Towers of Hanoi (Hard)
description: Stack 6 disks on the rightmost peg in the minimum number of moves

title: Color Harmony
description: Mix the perfect color combination using RGB sliders

title: Color Harmony (Easy)
description: Mix an easier color combination using RGB sliders.

title: Color Harmony (Hard)
description: Mix a harder color combination with more precision using RGB sliders.

title: Sheep Herding
description: Guide the wandering sheep into their pen by hovering with your cursor

title: Sheep Herding (Easy)
description: Guide 2 wandering sheep into their pen by hovering with your cursor

title: Sheep Herding (Hard)
description: Guide 10 wandering sheep into their pen by hovering with your cursor

title: File Upload
description: Upload any file to complete this challenge

title: File Upload (Hard)
description: Upload a valid MP3 file to complete this challenge

title: Canvas Catch
description: Drag the circle into the target zone to complete the challenge

title: Canvas Catch (Easy)
description: Drag the larger circle into the larger target zone. Easier!

title: Canvas Catch (Hard)
description: Drag the smaller circle into the smaller target zone. Harder!

title: Brick buster
description: Break all the bricks to win!

title: Brick buster (Easy)
description: Break fewer bricks to win!

title: Brick buster (Hard)
description: Break many more bricks to win! The ball is faster and the paddle is smaller.

title: Text Mirror
description: Perfectly copy the text

title: Text Mirror (Easy)
description: Perfectly copy the shorter, simpler text.

title: Text Mirror (Hard)
description: Perfectly copy the longer, more complex text with code and special characters.

title: Frog Crossing
description: Guide your frog safely across the busy road

title: Frog Crossing (Easy)
description: Guide your frog safely across a quieter road.

title: Frog Crossing (Hard)
description: Guide your frog safely across a very busy and fast road.

title: Button Hold
description: Hold the button for exactly 3 seconds

title: Button Hold (Easy)
description: Hold the button for exactly 1 second

title: Button Hold (Hard)
description: Hold the button for exactly 5 seconds

title: Key Combo
description: Press the correct key combination to unlock the secret

title: Key Combo (Easy)
description: Press an easier key combination to unlock the secret.

title: Key Combo (Hard)
description: Press a harder key combination to unlock the secret.

title: Scroll vertical
description: Scroll down to find the password

title: Scroll vertical (Easy)
description: Scroll down fewer boxes to find the password.

title: Scroll vertical (Hard)
description: Scroll down many more boxes to find the password.

title: Scroll horizontal
description: Scroll right to find the password

title: Scroll horizontal (Easy)
description: Scroll right fewer boxes to find the password.

title: Scroll horizontal (Hard)
description: Scroll right many more boxes to find the password.

title: WebGL Text
description: Recognise the WebGL shape

title: WebGL Text (Easy)
description: Recognise the simple WebGL shape (Square).

title: WebGL Text (Hard)
description: Recognise the complex WebGL shape (Star).

title: File Credentials
description: Download a credentials file and use it to log in

title: File Credentials (Easy)
description: Log in using the provided credentials displayed on the page.

title: File Credentials (Hard)
description: Download a JPEG image, extract credentials, and enter them along with the filename.

title: Webs, Assemble!
description: Find the secret code hidden in the WebAssembly module

title: Menu Navigator
description: Navigate through a menu bar to find the secret option

title: Menu Navigator (Easy)
description: Navigate through a simplified menu to find the secret option

title: Menu Navigator (Hard)
description: Navigate a complex, deeply nested menu to find the secret option

title: Popup Chaos
description: Close the annoying popup windows to reveal the secret password

title: Popup Chaos (Easy)
description: Close fewer popup windows to reveal the secret password

title: Popup Chaos (Hard)
description: Close many more annoying popup windows to reveal the secret password

title: Chart Read
description: Find the maximum price and time in the stock chart

title: Chart Read (Easy)
description: Find the highest price and the time it occurred. The price needs to be within 10% of the actual maximum.

title: Chart Read (Hard)
description: Identify the absolute maximum price and the precise time it occurred. The price must be within 2.5% of the actual maximum. The chart is more volatile.

title: Chart Transcribe
description: Transcribe the bar chart data into CSV format

title: Chart Transcribe (Easy)
description: Study the bar chart and transcribe both series of data in CSV format. Each line should contain three values: time, primary value, secondary value (e.g., "00:00,45,32"). Include all data points to complete the challenge! The primary series is the purple bar, and the secondary series is the blue bar.

title: Chart Transcribe (Hard)
description: Study the bar chart and transcribe both series of data in CSV format. Each line should contain three values: time, primary value, secondary value (e.g., "00:00,45,32"). Include all data points to complete the challenge! The primary series is the purple bar, and the secondary series is the blue bar.

title: Combination Lock
description: Solve Grampa's riddles to unlock the combination

title: Combination Lock (Easy)
description: Download and read the note to solve the easy riddles!

title: Combination Lock (Hard)
description: Download the benefactor's note. Decipher the complex riddles to unlock the ultimate combination!

title: Pixel Copy
description: Recreate the pattern by toggling pixels in the grid

title: Pixel Copy (Easy)
description: Recreate the simple pattern by toggling pixels in the grid

title: Pixel Copy (Hard)
description: Recreate the complex pattern by toggling pixels in the grid

title: Restricted Content
description: Access this content at your own risk. Your actions are being monitored.

title: Restricted Content (Easy)
description: Acknowledge a simple content warning.

title: Restricted Content (Hard)
description: Navigate a series of intimidating warnings and confirmations.

title: Prompt Defender
description: Can you resist deception and find the real password?

title: Prompt Defender (Easy)
description: A simpler test of attention to find the password.

title: Prompt Defender (Hard)
description: Resist multiple layers of deception to find the true password.

title: Shopping Challenge
description: Add items to your cart and calculate the total price to win!

title: Shopping Challenge (Easy)
description: Add fewer items to your cart and calculate the total price.

title: Shopping Challenge (Hard)
description: Add many items, some tricky, to your cart and calculate the total price.

title: The Maze
description: Navigate through a series of doors to find the exit - but choose wisely!

title: The Maze (Easy)
description: Navigate a simpler maze to find the exit.

title: The Maze (Hard)
description: Navigate a complex maze with more dead ends to find the exit.

title: Context Breaker
description: Can you scroll all the way to the bottom to find the secret password?

title: Context Breaker (Easy)
description: Scroll a short way to find the secret password.

title: Context Breaker (Hard)
description: Scroll an extremely long way to find the secret password. Good luck!

title: Diagonal Scroll
description: Navigate to the bottom-right corner through diagonal scrolling!

title: Diagonal Scroll (Easy)
description: Navigate to the bottom-right corner through diagonal scrolling! Fewer boxes.

title: Diagonal Scroll (Hard)
description: Navigate to the bottom-right corner through diagonal scrolling! Many more boxes.

title: Block Stack
description: Stack blocks above the red line using physics to win!

title: Block Stack (Easy)
description: Stack fewer blocks above a higher line for a shorter time.

title: Block Stack (Hard)
description: Stack more, smaller, and trickier blocks above a lower line for a longer time.

title: Nested Frames
description: Navigate through nested iframes to find the hidden button

title: Nested Frames (Easy)
description: Navigate through fewer nested iframes to find the hidden button

title: Nested Frames (Hard)
description: Navigate through more nested iframes to find the hidden button

title: Tab Sync
description: Synchronize colors between browser tabs to reveal the password

title: OTP Entry
description: Enter a 6-digit one-time password with auto-focusing inputs

title: OTP Entry (Easy)
description: Enter a 4-digit one-time password.

title: OTP Entry (Hard)
description: Scan a QR code with an authenticator app and enter the 6-digit code.

title: Print to Reveal
description: Print this page to PDF to reveal the hidden password

title: Human Verification
description: Complete a CAPTCHA challenge to prove you're human

title: Human Verification (Easy)
description: Quickly complete a CAPTCHA challenge to prove you're human.

title: Human Verification (Hard)
description: Complete an advanced CAPTCHA challenge under high security scrutiny.

title: Right Click Reveal
description: Use your context menu skills to reveal the hidden password

title: Right Click Reveal (Easy)
description: Right-click a large, obvious area to reveal the password.

title: Right Click Reveal (Hard)
description: Find and right-click a small, specific area among decoys.

title: Calendar Comprehension
description: Study a calendar and answer questions about the events

title: Calendar Comprehension (Easy)
description: Study a calendar and answer a few simple questions about the events.

title: Calendar Comprehension (Hard)
description: Study a calendar and answer several complex questions about the events.

title: Map Panner
description: Pan around a mysterious map to find the hidden treasure

title: Map Panner (Easy)
description: Pan around a smaller map to find the hidden treasure. It's closer and easier to find!

title: Map Panner (Hard)
description: Pan around a vast and treacherous map to find the elusive treasure. Good luck!

title: LadyBird Planner
description: Plan the ladybird's path to reach the flower using directional emojis

title: LadyBird Planner (Easy)
description: Plan the ladybird's path on a smaller grid with fewer obstacles.

title: LadyBird Planner (Hard)
description: Plan the ladybird's path on a larger, more complex grid.

title: Shop Admin
description: Update product prices in the admin panel

title: Shop Admin (Easy)
description: Update a specific product price with clear instructions.

title: Shop Admin (Hard)
description: Find a product, calculate a discount, and update its price.

title: Recipe Calculator
description: Help calculate the right amount of ingredients for a dinner party

title: Recipe Calculator (Easy)
description: Calculate ingredients for a simple recipe and small serving.

title: Recipe Calculator (Hard)
description: Calculate ingredients for a complex recipe, large serving, with unit conversion.

title: Advanced Calendar Challenge
description: Test your calendar comprehension skills with complex time calculations

title: Advanced Calendar Challenge (Easy)
description: Test your calendar comprehension with simpler time calculations.

title: Advanced Calendar Challenge (Hard)
description: Test your calendar comprehension with very complex time calculations and edge cases.

title: Stock Market Insight
description: Discover the best tech stock to buy in 2025

title: Stock Market Insight (Easy)
description: Quickly find the recommended tech stock.

title: Stock Market Insight (Hard)
description: Analyze a detailed report to find the best tech stock.

title: Verification Challenge
description: Can you decipher the verification code?

title: Verification Challenge (Easy)
description: Can you decipher the verification code?

title: Verification Challenge (Hard)
description: Can you decipher the verification code?

title: Resume Detective
description: Download a resume and extract the correct information

title: Click Pixel
description: Click the single target pixel on the screen.

title: Click Pixel (Easy)
description: Click the larger target pixel on the screen.

title: Click Pixel (Hard)
description: Click the tiny 1x1 target pixel with no hints.
